name: GBU-27 Paveway III
description:
Paveway III is a family of laser-guided bombs, a sub-group of the larger Raytheon Paveway III family of weapons. The Paveway guidance package consists of a seeker package attached to the nose of the weapon, and a wing kit attached to the rear to provide stability and greater range.

Compared to the GBU-10 family, or the Paveway II family, the GBU-27 glides farther as a result of more efficient guidance technology.

The GBU-27 Paveway III is a BLU-109 hardened penetration bomb equipped with Paveway III laser guidance kit.
